thread.title: ALERT! Liberals Trying To CHANGE 25th Amendment Against Trump, Here’s What It Means…
thread.title_full: ALERT! Liberals Trying To CHANGE 25th Amendment Against Trump, Here’s What It Means…

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: ALERT! Liberals Trying To CHANGE 25th Amendment Against Trump, Here’s What It Means…
text:
Liberals simply can’t come to terms with the fact Donald Trump is president. 
The latest liberal plan is to use the 25th Amendment as a tool to get rid of Trump. 
Basically, a liberal Congressman is pretending he wants to update the 25th Amendment but he clearly just wants to bash Trump.   
Here’s what he wrote in an op-ed.   
From Oregon Live :   
The erratic behavior of Donald Trump has raised new questions about his mental and emotional capacity to discharge the tremendous burdens of the most powerful position in the world. It is the president who has the ability to launch nuclear weapons, unleashing untold devastation on the world. Presidents can create diplomatic chaos or move markets with the most carefully crafted declarations, let alone late-night tweets with the grammar and misspellings of a fifth-grader and decidedly unpresidential tone. 
That’s basically the only message he has. He is masking his Trump slam by saying he wants to change a “flaw” in the 25th Amendment. 
His argument boils down to the claim that Trump is so crazy we should make it easier for other people outside the cabinet to relieve Trump of his duties like we have in the past when presidents have been sick or shot. 
Here’s more.
